attributes.action: make it compulsory for sports organisations to take all ranked/invited athletes
attributes.additional_details: To give all the hardworking, dedicated and passionate athletes in the UK get the opportunities they deserve and to help aid sporting participation across all sports in the country. Will provide lots of motivation for present and future athletes to keep on competing and protect the history of sporting performance this country has.
attributes.background: Make it compulsory for all sporting bodies in the UK, to take athletes to Major Championships in whatever sport if they are invited by the World governing body or they are ranked high enough to qualify by the World Governing Body.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about who can take part in sporting or athletic events are a matter for the organisers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
